com.easemob.user

Class UserUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easemob.user.UserUtil

  • public class UserUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    this is class define all pathes the actuall user class is defined in application domain but in easemob sdk, we need to access basic user data, including id, nick, sipnumber so we can send notification, make voip call
